Key Match Events: Australia's goal at the start of the second half opened the scoreboard.
Australia's second goal at the 70th minute put the match much calmer.
The match ended with Australia 2-0 India.
Pre-Game Insights: Australia comes from closing its preparation against Bahrain with a 2-0 victory.
Australia is the favorite to finish as first place and to advance to the next round.
India did not have any preparation matches and aims to cause a surprise in the Asian Cup.
Neither team has any injured or suspended players.
Japan's Yoshimi Yamashita will be in charge of the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The stadium was more than half full for this match.
The match was part of the AFC Asian Cup 2024.
